47481.summary: Some customers in the South Granville area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank you for your patience.
